name: Way of the Mind's Eye
effects: Physical damage (1.9x, ATK) to one enemy
Reduce ATK and MAG by 40% for 3 turns to one enemy

desc_long: Deals damage to one enemy and reduces their ATK and MAG.

적 1명에게 피해를 주고, 공격력과 마력을 감소시킵니다.
